mapper.select:
AND name like concat('%', #{menu.name}, '%')
order by pid, menu_sort

select distinct m.id, m.pid, m.type, m.name, m.component, m.menu_sort, m.icon, m.path, m.hidden, m.in_layout, m.auth, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms from sys_menu m left join role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join user_role urole on rm.role_id = urole.role_id left join sys_role ro on urole.role_id = ro.id left join user u on urole.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{userId} and m.type in (1, 2) AND ro.enabled = 1 order by m.pid, m.menu_sort
select m.id from sys_menu m left join role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} order by m.pid, m.menu_sort
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join user_role urole on rm.role_id = urole.role_id

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join user_role urole on rm.role_id = urole.role_id left join sys_role r on r.id = urole.role_id where r.enabled = 1 and urole.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId}
select count(1) from sys_menu where pid = #{menuId} limit 1
